payroll_desc: Rahul Sharma, holding the position of HR Manager in the Administration department, earns an annual salary of ₹78,859.00. His role involves overseeing HR operations, managing recruitment processes, and ensuring compliance with company policies.

Anil Kumar serves as the Maintenance Supervisor in the Maintenance and Housekeeping department. He is responsible for maintaining the hospital facilities, ensuring that all equipment is in working order, and supervising the housekeeping staff. Anil earns an annual salary of ₹35,423.00.
